ygData.subject: RL significant others & getting married or being with IG players
ygData.msgSnippet: Interesting question about having on-line marriages and/or boyfriends. In my real life I am married and my husband REFUSES to play EQ with me though we could
ygData.messageBody:
Interesting question about having on-line marriages and/or boyfriends.
In my real life I am married and my husband REFUSES to play EQ with me
though we could if we wanted. If he'd play, in game as well as life, I
would be with him. BUT he doesn't play and in game I have a steady
love interest from my guild. He knows i'm married in RL, my husband
knows I have been "seeing" this other elf on line, and I know that my
on-line boyfriend is also married, and his wife knows that he is seeing
my character on line. Does that make sense?

Other characters who have flirted with Genneth seriously also know that
I am married. I try to be honest about that to the guys out there who
see a cute bardic lass and don't connect her to the woman behind her.
If I think they are flirting really hard and are misinterpreting Genn's
in character responses, I always tell them so there will be no
misunderstandings.
